General.Name: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited
General.Description: Fancy Wood Industries Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture and sale of rubber wood products in Thailand and internationally. The company's products include particle board and interlocking rubber wood. It is also involved in the real estate development activities; sale of detached houses, townhouses, condominiums, and land; and rental of property. The company was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 357 Moo 12, Soi Suksawat 84 (Kusang), Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10290
